idea-plugin.name: Notes
idea-plugin.description:
Simple Notes Plugin

A lightweight and intuitive notes plugin that adds a dedicated sidebar tool window to your IDE for quick note-taking and organization.

Features:

  • Quick Note Creation: Add notes instantly with the + button or through the Tools menu
  • Visual Tag System: Organize notes with colorful, clickable tag chips
  • Custom Tags: Create your own tags dynamically - no predefined limitations
  • Rich Editing: Edit both note content and tags in a unified dialog
  • Persistent Storage: Notes are saved per project and persist across IDE sessions
  • Clean UI: Native IntelliJ look and feel that adapts to your theme
  • Safe Deletion: Delete notes with confirmation to prevent accidents

Perfect for:

  • TODO lists and task tracking
  • Code snippets and reminders
  • Project documentation notes
  • Meeting notes and ideas
  • Development thoughts and mental notes

Works seamlessly across all JetBrains IDEs including IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm, PhpStorm, CLion, GoLand, RubyMine, Rider, and Android Studio.
